name: Drag&Point
description:
There are two mini game in this project. One is DragBox & other is MatchHat.  Instructions are listed in instruction Page.  

DragBox : In dragbox you have to drag a box and eat points. If you eat green point your score will increase & if you eat red points yur life will decrease. Play it out.

MatchHat:  Its a prototype of simple matching game where you have to drag & drop objects in its corect location . check it out.

there are pc, apk & webgl build in the project
